title: "Hobgoblin Special Forces!" - Mechanical Modifications In Monsters Of The Multiverse
itunes:title: "Hobgoblin Special Forces!" - Mechanical Modifications In Monsters Of The Multiverse
description:
Here ye! Here ye! Change is afoot, be gone Subraces and war mongering Hobgoblins for the Monsters of the Multiverse is here! This week the Halflings crack open the multiverse and get excited about some BIG changes. From the overhaul of the Racial descriptors to the fact that Genasi are kind of good now!

Check out the incredible DnD In A Castle Here! Register now!

Want more 3BH in your life?
You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including kickbacks where we hang out with some of our favourite people and previous guests of the show and discuss... well anything we feel like! 

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @3blackhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Here ye! Here ye! Change is afoot, be gone Subraces and war mongering Hobgoblins for the Monsters of the Multiverse is here! This week the Halflings crack open the multiverse and get excited about some BIG changes. From the overhaul of the Racial descriptors to the fact that Genasi are kind of good now!

Check out the incredible DnD In A Castle Here! Register now!
